summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of the City of Seattle in the aggregate sum of $1,000,000 of a loan of $2,000,000 authorized at a general election held in the City of Seattle on March 8, 1910, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 22732; directing the issuance of bonds therefor; providing a form of such bonds and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
